lines.p: O God, save me by your name,And defend me with your power.
O God, hear my prayer;Pay attention to the words of my mouth.

For strangers rise up against me,And ruthless men seek my life.
They have no regard for God. (Selah)
Look! God is my helper;Jehovah is with those supporting me.
He will repay my foes with their own evil;In your faithfulness, put an end to them.

I will sacrifice to you willingly.
I will praise your name, O Jehovah, for it is good.
For he saves me from every distress,And I will look in triumph on my enemies.
